Title: Love Among the Ruins
Plot: Don's father-in-law pays a visit to his daughter's family. Peggy works hard on a campaign while the firm tries to decide if they will accommodate an unusual request from a client. Elsewhere, Roger plans a wedding.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Talia Balsam, Ryan Cutrona, Embeth Davidtz, Eric Ladin, Abigail Spencer, Elizabeth Rice, Kevin Cooney, Alexa Alemanni, Derek Ray, Brian Carpenter, Billy Finnigan, Jeremy Scott Johnson
